channel.title: Need To see if This Works
channel.description:
Hey guys, I was just wondering, I am making a Server compiler and runner and i don't know if it works, So if you could test it out on one of your servers and post a reply if it does.
[code] @echo off Title Dog eats Dog Compiler color 1E :menu cls echo. echo Type Run to Run your server echo Type Compile to compile your server echo Type Info on Information to who made this compiler echo. set /p option=Option: if %option%==Run goto Run if %option%==Compile goto Compile if %option%==Info goto Info if %option%==* goto Wrong :Run @echo off Title Running Server cls echo. echo Do you wish to Run your server? Type Y for Yes , N for No echo. set /p option=Option: if %option%==Y goto Yes if %option%==y goto Yes if %option%==N goto No if %option%==n goto No :Yes cls java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause exit :No cls goto menu :Compile cls Title Compiler echo Do you wish to Compile your server? Type Y for Yes , N for No set /p option=Option: if %option%==Y goto Yes2 if %option%==y goto Yes2 if %option%==N goto No2 if %option%==n goto No2 :Yes2 @ECHO OFF title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java echo.Files compiled successfully echo. java -cp . server pause :No2 cls goto menu :Info cls echo. echo This compiler was made by: Dog eats dog. echo There is more Updates and Versions to come soon. echo. pause goto menu :Wrong cls echo. echo Please time in the correct Word as Described. echo. pause goto menu pause [/code]

w3wt!! Ill post it in teh morning.

item.title: Need To see if This Works
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Hey guys, I was just wondering, I am making a Server compiler and runner and i donâ€™t know if it works, So if you could test it out on one of your servers and post a reply if it does.

@echo off
Title Dog eats Dog Compiler
color 1E
:menu
cls
echo.
echo Type Run to Run your server
echo Type Compile to compile your server
echo Type Info on Information to who made this compiler
echo.
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Run goto Run
if %option%==Compile goto Compile
if %option%==Info goto Info
if %option%==* goto Wrong
:Run
@echo off
Title Running Server
cls
echo.
echo Do you wish to Run your server? Type Y for Yes , N for No
echo.
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Y goto Yes
if %option%==y goto Yes
if %option%==N goto No
if %option%==n goto No
:Yes
cls
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
exit
:No
cls
goto menu
:Compile
cls
Title Compiler
echo Do you wish to Compile your server? Type Y for Yes , N for No
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Y goto Yes2
if %option%==y goto Yes2
if %option%==N goto No2
if %option%==n goto No2
:Yes2
@ECHO OFF
title Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
echo.Files compiled successfully
echo.
java -cp . server
pause
:No2
cls
goto menu
:Info
cls
echo.
echo This compiler was made by: Dog eats dog.
echo There is more Updates and Versions to come soon.
echo.
pause
goto menu
:Wrong
cls
echo.
echo Please time in the correct Word as Described.
echo.
pause
goto menu
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Need To see if This Works
